Title: Ice Breakers
Description:
I knew the ancestor would approve!

I don't know much about spirits -- Kauj is the shaman. But we will need to appease the great Spirits of Air and Water before they will appear to us. 

Anyone could see water elementals up the mountain slowly freezing. It is not a natural freeze. Cold has been coming down the mountains more than usual, lately. Left be, our entire river could ice over.

Release them from their icy prisons!
ObjectivesText: Break Freezing Waters from ice near the Kauriq Gleamlet.
RewardText: Excellent. Otu'rorq, the local River Spirit, will be pleased to know his river will continue to flow, for now.
